author: Sydney Bucksbaum
title: Tom Hanks shares update now that he and Rita Wilson returned home after coronavirus diagnosis - EW.com
description: Tom Hanks shares update now that he and Rita Wilson returned home after coronavirus diagnosis EW.com Tom Hanks Is Grateful Upon Return to U.S. After COVID-19 Treatment E! Online Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson return home, encourage others to social distance amid p…
content:
Tom Hanks has shared an update now that he and wife Rita Wilson returned home safe and sound after their coronavirus diagnoses and quarantine in Australia.
"Hey, Folks... We're home now and, like the rest of America, we carry on with sheltering in place and … [+1986 chars]
